```{r setup}
library(epireview)
```

```{r}
ebola <- load_epidata('ebola')
params <- ebola[["params"]]
forest_plot_rt(params, col_by = "population_country", shape_by = "parameter_value_type")
forest_plot_r0(params, col_by = "population_country", shape_by = "parameter_value_type")

```
